alert.note: Alert for Meade (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 7:23PM MDT until July 07 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Meade County in west central South Dakota... * Until 800 PM MDT. * At 722 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles northeast of Fort Meade, or 4 miles east of Sturgis, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Sturgis, Tilford, Bear Butte State Park and Fort Meade. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 32 and 42. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
